alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 12:51AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Holt and Boyd Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Naper to 10 miles south of Atkinson. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, Spencer, O`Neill, Atkinson, Stuart, Butte, Lynch, Page, Naper, Gross, Inman, Bristow, Emmet, Dustin, Anoka, Monowi, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Opportunity, Midway and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 280 and 318. Highway 281 between mile markers 176 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 93 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
